My journey to become a Web Developer!

Here are the summary of what I have learnt throughout and projects that I have created.

I am a passionate and innovative front-end web developer with a keen eye for creating seamless and engaging online experiences. Throughout my journey to become a web developer, I've created various projects that have showcased my skills in areas such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks. Whether it's building responsive and user-friendly interfaces or optimizing functionalities such as accessibility and SEO, I approach each project with enthusiasm and a commitment to delivering high-quality results.
